hibernate-mapping.query: select new org.mifos.application.master.util.valueobjects.LookUpMaster(lookup.lookUpId,lookupvalue.lookUpValue) from org.mifos.application.master.util.valueobjects.LookUpValue lookup,org.mifos.application.master.util.valueobjects.LookUpEntity entity,org.mifos.application.master.util.valueobjects.LookUpValueLocale lookupvalue where entity.entityType=:entityType and lookup.lookUpEntity.entityId =entity.entityId and lookup.lookUpId=lookupvalue.lookUpId and lookupvalue.localeId=:localeId
